tit.e: Angaryo Family (Abe Family and Kamo Family)
Angaryo Family (Abe Family and Kamo Family)
Angaryo Family (Abe Family and Kamo Family)

sen.j: 安賀両家（あんがりょうけ）とは陰陽道の宗家である阿倍氏と賀茂氏の総称。
sen.e: The Angaryo family is the collective name of the Abe clan and the Kamo clan which are the head families of Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements).

The Angaryo family is the collective name of the Abe clan and the Kamo clan which are the head families of Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements).

The Angaryo family is the collective name of the Abe clan and the Kamo clan which are the head families of Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements).

sen.j: 後に改姓し安倍氏流は「土御門家」に賀茂氏流は「勘解由小路家」と名乗る。
sen.e: Later changing the family names, the Abe clan called itself "Tsuchimikado family," while the Kamo clan "the Kadenokoji family."
Later changing the family names, the Abe clan called itself "Tsuchimikado family," while the Kamo clan "the Kadenokoji family."
